拿不出嫁妆，印度北方邦一媳妇被公婆灌硫酸致死 2019-08-16 http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/
Woman dies after in-laws pour acid into her mouth for not fulfilling dowry demand in UP拿不出嫁妆，北方邦一媳妇被公婆灌硫酸致死BAREILLY: A 21-year-old woman died after she was allegedly assaulted and her in-laws poured acid into her mouth as her parents could not fulfil their dowry demand in Bahedi area on Tuesday morning.According to victim Yashoda Devi’s father Girish Sharma, “Yashoda had called early in the morning informing us that her husband and in-laws were thrashing her and forcing her to drink something.”Sharma immediately informed Bahedi police about the matter, and he and his son Manish rushed to Yashoda’s in-laws house.
“Upon reaching Bahedi, I found my daughter lying on the floor and gasping, while her husband and family members were missing,” said Sharma.父母满足不了婆家的嫁妆要求，21岁女子被公婆灌硫酸，结果不幸身亡。根据受害者父亲Girish Sharma的说法，“女儿Yashoda 一大早就打电话来，说丈夫和公婆殴打她，还逼她喝东西。”Sharma立即报警。他和儿子紧急赶往女儿的婆家。“到了后，我发现女儿躺在地上，奄奄一息，而她丈夫和公婆已经失踪。
印度时报读者评论：译文： http://www.santaihu.com/48243.html原报道：http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/Proud Bhakt•India•2 hours ago

Shaikh Shaukat•dubai•3 hours ago
EVERY DAY WE READ THAT SOME WOMEN ARE KILLED IN THE NAME OF DOWRY , BUT MODI AND HIS BJP GOVT KEEP SILENCE. WHY..... WHY......我们每天都看到一些女人因为嫁妆没给而被杀的报道。莫迪和人民党却一直保持沉默，为什么，为什么
SanShi•Pune•3 hours ago
JUST HANG THEM IF PROVEN GUILTY!如果被证明有罪，那就处死他们
Manasvi Srivastava•7 hours ago
It is haer parents'' fault to get her married just on the basis of caste. See what fellow-caste perspn can do! If the girl had married as per her own choice, this would not have happened. Arranged marriage and caste are two sides of the same coin. Both are equally evil and lead to dowry demands. In this case the in-laws should be made to drink what the girl was made to drink and the parents should be sentenced to 5 years jail for the crime of forced marriage.这是父母的错，根据种姓进行的包办婚姻。如果是自由恋爱的，那么就不会发生这种事了。包办婚姻和种姓是一个硬币的两面。都是邪恶的，随之而来的是嫁妆要求。就此案来说，作为惩罚，让那对公婆也喝硫酸，而女孩的父母逼她嫁过去的，应该判5年徒刑
Atchia Anwar Osman•22 hours ago
This is a societal tragedy and such acts must be punished with all severity possible....My heart goes to the poor dead woman and to her grieving family...And ultimately the Creator will deal with them.......这是社会悲剧啊。这种罪行就该受严惩。同情那位媳妇，也同情她的家人。
Tushar Roy•23 hours ago
Money, is the root of all "EVIL"金钱是一切罪恶之源
ANSHUMAN SINGH•1 day ago
Another women... Acid attack.. Noone fear thanks to Indian law又一位女人遭到了硫酸攻击。印度法律震慑不了罪犯，凶手无法无天
Ttasnim•1 day ago
Her in-laws too must be compelled to drink the acid! That's justice and that will also deter others to do such an atrocious act!也让她公婆喝！这是正义！
